title: Calories in Baked Hot Cheetos
meta_description: Discover calories in baked hot cheetos per serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for your snack.
assumptions: Standard 1 oz (28g) serving of baked Flamin' Hot Cheetos, crunchy variety, no additional toppings or dips.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor intensity, batch, and serving size. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 1 oz serving of baked hot cheetos contains about 150 calories and 16g carbs.

label_note: Values mirror standard Nutrition Facts labels for quick comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of baked hot cheetos?
Are baked hot cheetos lower in fat than regular?
faqs.a: Yes, baked versions typically have less fat (9g vs. 10-11g in fried) per serving.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in baked hot cheetos?
faqs.a: Around 280 mg per 1 oz serving, due to spicy seasoning.

faqs.q: Do baked hot cheetos have protein?
How do calories in baked hot cheetos compare to original cheetos?
faqs.a: Baked hot cheetos have similar calories (150) but less fat than fried originals (160+ kcal).
